type.name: org.gradle.play.platform.PlayPlatform
type.description: Defines and configures a Play Framework environment including versions of Play, Scala and Java.

method.name: getJavaPlatform
method.description:
Version of Java Runtime to use.

returns:version of the Java runtime

method.name: getPlayVersion
method.description:
Version of Play Framework to use

returns:version of the Play Framework

method.name: getScalaPlatform
method.description:
Version of Scala Runtime to use.

returns:version of the Scala runtime

property.name: javaPlatform
property.description:
Version of Java Runtime to use.

returns:version of the Java runtime

property.name: playVersion
property.description:
Version of Play Framework to use

returns:version of the Play Framework

property.name: scalaPlatform
property.description:
Version of Scala Runtime to use.

returns:version of the Scala runtime
